snippet: A consortium said that it had won a $233 million settlement in a dispute over cost overruns in an expansion of the Panama Canal.
abstract: Consortium of builders led by Sacyr says it has won $233 million settlement in a dispute over cost overruns in an expansion of the Panama Canal.
lead_paragraph: A consortium said that it had won a $233 million settlement in a dispute over cost overruns in an expansion of the Panama Canal.

headline.main: Consortium of Canal Builders Win Settlement in Panama
headline.print_headline: Consortium of Canal Builders Wins Settlement in Panama
